page.title: 11LOCAL HOUSING CONDITIONS
page.content: Housing Survey. A survey of local buildings was carried out in 2 areas close to G.C. school. Both areas consist largely of modern post-war property but one is dominated by council-owned houses (with some recent private purchases)whilst the other comprises privately-owned housing. The aims of the survey were 1.to assess the condition & state of repair of property. 2.to observe the building materials, number of rooms & size of house. 3.toassess the provision of local amenities such as parks & play areas.4.to check the provision of gardens & open space. Areas Surveyed. 1.Spring Lane Estate. The houses here are almost entirely post-war(1945-1955) with some recent additions built during the 1970's.
